snippet.title: Radix Chronicle — Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/enb/radix-chronicle

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2430540/Radix_Chronicle/

Radix Chronicle is a fast-paced tactical RPG inspired by classic from the SNES and early Playstation eras. Instead of hitting and missing based on luck, you use timing to strike down the enemy! Your spells can change the battlefield in your favor, but beware... the enemies have plenty of tricks up their sleeves, too.

-------
The beginning of our tale:

When the new king sent princess Sahana to the far-flung hinterlands of the kingdom to marry a provincial governor, she didn't expect a warm welcome. And that's great, because she didn't get one!

Her reluctant groom, Kadi, treats her well but mostly avoids her. He spends his days doing "research" in the woods. Vexingly, that research seems to involve a beautiful mercenary named Celestora—who says she wants Kadi dead, but spends all her time with him anyway. Hana's "exile" isn't the worst, but she has had just about enough of this little situation...

Join this band of misfits as they journey into the wilds, both to quell monsters that trouble the province and for Kadi's... "research."
-------

All gameplay in this trailer is in an early state, with much polish and balancing to come. Your support is appreciated in making this game a reality!
-------

Game credits
Ray - programming
Liz - illustrations
Ian - logo calligraphy
Marcus - game design; writing; sprites, effects, and animations; music composition and production
